Action: # Autocheck: Autocheck
autocheck/autocheck
## Preparation

Activate the testdrive setup for this test suite, by using the following url

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//testdrive/autocheck

Expected Test Results: You receive the testdrive setup details, including an admin account for you to use, and an application and journal which have been autochecked for testing

Action:
Log into DOAJ using the admin credentials supplied by the testdrive.  You may want to do this in a private browsing window, so you can remain logged in to your own account in your main window.

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//account/login

Expected Test Results: You are logged in as an admin user

Action: You may now proceed to the tests below
## Application autochecks
Go to the Application admin_url supplied by the testdrive setup

Expected Test Results: You are looking at a test Application created for this test

Action: Scroll down to find the ISSN (print) and ISSN (online) fields

Expected Test Results: Both fields are annotated with a green tick, and text which says that ISSN is fully registered at ISSN.org

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the application form
Click the "Dismiss" button on both annotations by the ISSN fields

Expected Test Results: The annotations are removed from the form, and replaced with text indicating that the check was dismissed

On the right-hand side of the form, beneath the notes, there is a section "Dismissed Autochecks" which lists both annotations you just dismissed.  This section is beneath the scrolling notes section, you may need to hover and scroll the notes section to see it.

Action: Click "Undismiss" by the text on the form for the ISSN (print) field which indicates that a check was dismissed

Expected Test Results: The annotation is restored to the form
The annotation disappears from the "Dismissed Autochecks" section, leaving only one record there now

Action: Click "Undismiss" by the record in the "Dismissed Autochecks" section

Expected Test Results: The annotation is restored to the form
The annotation disappears from the "Dismissed Autochecks" section, leaving no records there now

Action: Scroll to the "Best Practice" section of the application form, and look at the "Long-term preservation services" question

Expected Test Results: 2 checks are visible attached to this question, one for CLOCKSS and one for LOCKSS, indicating that they are present in Keepers Registry

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the application form
Click "Dismiss" by both notifications

Expected Test Results: The annotations are removed from the form, and replaced with text indicating that the check was dismissed
The "Dismissed Autochecks" section lists both checks you just dismissed

Action: ## Teardown
Close your private browsing window you used for the test
Click the "Teardown" url supplied by the testdrive setup

Expected Test Results: You receive a success notification in your browser window

Action: You can now close the testdrive browser tab/window
